column5: Today, Greensot, Sleded and I hit a local spot hoping for carp and cats. We got into a few bullheads and Sleded got into a beauty 32 inch carp. It was all caught on video too. But for now we'll have to settle for pics.        I think Sleded's secret was his new bait bucket. Great idea Sleded.. no more worries of bringing extra gear!    Thanks for the great day guys I had a blast. See ya tomorrow Jed!
Great report. Nice carp!! I see your cats are prettier than the ones I caught. LOL   dsn
Nice carp! You guys need to start posting the action angling videos again Season 2!
So...that's the way it's gonna be, ehhh. Now that the lakes are free of the ice, yer gonna go fishing...ehhh!  Keep 'em comin'!

Good report Rich, to bad about the no steelies but it's always good to get and get something.And that is a nice looking carp sled wtg. I also went out for carp last night and caught about a million of those bullheads, oh well better than nothing.
Sounded like a great day with fellow ofners!  Good on you for meeting and getting out.  Some nice fish there too....especially the carp!
Right on Rich! I am looking forward to the video!
And as promised here is the stock footage of Sleded's 32 inch carp fight!  http://video.google.ca/videoplay?docid=-68...84&hl=en-CA
Nice Video, you guys going to make anymore action angling episodes?
Where's the net? In the truck! lol way to go... havent needed a net in the truck before lol Wtg guys
Good to see you guys back out and posting.Good thing the girl friends let you out to shoot the carp video See you in a few weeks
